name: Associação Portuguesa de Greenkeepers
headAddress: Campo de Golfe de Palmares, Meia Praia, Apartado 74,
goal:
About Associação Portuguesa de Greenkeepers (APG)


The "Associação Portuguesa de Greenkeepers" is the professional association for the men and women who manage and maintain the game’s most valuable resource — the golf course. Today, APG and its members are recognized by the golf industry at Portugal, as one of the key contributors in elevating the game and business to its current state.

APG as its focus golf course management. From its headquarters in Lisbon, the association provides education, information and representation to more than 200 members. APG mission is to serve its members, advance their profession and enhance the enjoyment, growth and vitality of the game of golf.

APG take the environment isseus very serious and is a collaborative effort of the environmental and golf communities, dedicated to strengthening the compatibility of golf with the natural environment.
euInitiatives: The use of plant protection products - fungicides, herbicides, insecticides, growth regulaters and wetting agents
